roleset.name: to flow or come out
roleset.note: SPEW-V NOTES: Member of VN classes pour-9.5, substance_emission-43.4. (from spew.01-v)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: We see , smell and hear slums filled [*] with `` the echoes of hawkers advertising their wares interspersed [*]with abusive language , rattling coughs and the sound of people gathering spittle in their throats and spewing into the street . ''

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: A volcano [*ICH*-1] will erupt next month on the fabled Strip : a 60-foot mountain spewing smoke and flame every five minutes .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The photos showed active geysers on Io spewing sulfurous material 190 miles into its atmosphere and indicated that Europa may have an ocean hidden [*] under a thick sheet of ice .
